Pre-Game Insights: Austria are the favourite to win this upcoming match and will look to get a win on home soil to get confidence before going into the major upcoming tournament.
Both sides have some great attacking players and in this match, we can expect both teams to play very attacking football.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The average number of goals in meetings between Austria and Serbia is 3.75.
Austria have a winning streak of 5 matches.
Austria score 2.6 goals when playing at home and Serbia score 1 goal when playing away (on average).
Others: Ralf Ragnich have a very strong squad for this summer’s tournament and there are no major injury concerns for the home side.
Dragan Stojkovic also have a decent squad, they have good players in every department, especially their attackers are in fine form. Serbia also doesn’t have any injury concerns.
